publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8114 Iain Gray: Scotland Bill - UK Legislationâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, further to motion S3M-7550 passed on 9 December 2010 supporting the general principles of the Scotland Bill as introduced in the House of Commons on 30 November 2010, the Bill be considered by the UK Parliament; invites the UK Government and the UK Parliament to consider the amendments and proposals made in the report of the Scotland Bill Committee, and looks forward to considering any amendments made to the Bill with a view to debating them in a further legislative consent motion before the Bill is passed for Royal Assent. Supported by: Annabel Goldie*, Tavish Scott*
S3M-8114 Scotland Bill - UK Legislation (lodged on 8 March 2011) Pauline McNeill*
